righthandWords.words: he managed to see the doctor.|he wasn't able to see the doctor.|she had never had lessons.|she had had many lessons.|he wasn't happy.|it was very well paid.|there is a smoking area in the garden.|we prefer you to smoke outside.

lefthandWords.words: Although Jack was late for the appointment,|Even though Jack was early for the appointment,|Marianne could speak good French, although|Sylvia couldn't speak Italian very well, even though|Kurt had a fantastic job but|Donald had a terrible job, although|We don't allow smoking in the building. However,|We allow smoking in the building but
